title: studio apartment
map_address: 3671 Hudson Manor Terrace, Apt 5f near 236 and 238 st.
posting_body: ['An austere studio apartment in the Bronx.', 'The Riverdale section of the Bx against the Hudson River.', 'A self contained unit with bathroom and kitchen overlooking two public schools in the background on a tree lined st and parkland on the right of the building.', 'It is within walking distance of transportation, the no.10 bus.', 'I wish to take a leave of absence for three months.', 'It would be available for three months for a visitor at a reasonable sum per month.', 'This is designed for, it seems, one individual.', 'I should mention that there is no television screen or HDTV inside this studio;there is cable-ready access available;it would be the responsibility of the occupant to arrange a connection with a cable company:FiOS, for example.', 'I take full advantage of the local public library which is a mere 10 minute walk from this apartment complex just beyond the local public school on the right as you exit the building.', 'For the sake of clarity, this studio would be available in September.']
